attributes.comment:
To whom it may concern;
We have an adopted daughter from China who will have been with us for two years in May 2007.
The process to get her here was tedious at best. We didn't, however, have to renew our documents
because of time issues. If the change is made to the price of the documents, fingerprints,etc., it
will become a financial hardship for those who have to renew documents prior to adoption. Because
China is extending the wait time for adoption, renewal of documents and fingerprinting is inevitable.
Please do not make it more prohibitive for families to adopt these abandoned children. Keep the
cost the same for the documentation and fingerprinting.
Thank you,
Margaret F Stutzman

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Margaret F. Stutzman
